Uses of Package
moulton.scalable.utils

Packages that use moulton.scalable.utils
Package Description
moulton.scalable.clickables
The clickables package contains classes that pertain to menu components that can be clicked.
moulton.scalable.containers
The containers package contains classes that are intended for holding menu components, especially panel classes which serve as nodes in the menu rendering tree structure.
moulton.scalable.draggables
The draggables package contains clickable subclasses that are intended to be dragged or scrolled.
moulton.scalable.geometrics
The geometrics package contains classes pertaining to primarily to aesthetics, such as lines and polygons.
moulton.scalable.texts
The texts package contains classes and menu components that ar primarily dedicated to holding and processing text for display in the menu.
moulton.scalable.utils
The utils package contains classes that serve general utility function.
moulton.scalable.visuals
The visuals package contains classes that relate to images and animations.
  • Classes in moulton.scalable.utils used by moulton.scalable.clickables
    Class Description
    MenuComponent
    The parent class for all components to fit inside of a parent panel.
  • Classes in moulton.scalable.utils used by moulton.scalable.containers
    Class Description
    GridFormatter
    GridFormatter will hold MenuComponents in a grid that can have variable margins, frames, and weights, then will give the coordinate specifications for each component through GridFormatter.findCompCoordinates(MenuComponent, Rectangle).
    MenuComponent
    The parent class for all components to fit inside of a parent panel.
  • Classes in moulton.scalable.utils used by moulton.scalable.draggables
    Class Description

  • Classes in moulton.scalable.utils used by moulton.scalable.texts

  • Classes in moulton.scalable.utils used by moulton.scalable.visuals
